ops.action: Extract logical sections into dedicated component files under frontend/src/components/. The project already follows this pattern (e.g., LayerPanel.jsx).
ops.title: Extract large JSX into dedicated components
ops.trigger: When App.jsx or any single component exceeds ~200 lines

ops.action: Both .loom/compound/instincts.json and .loom/compound/INSTINCTS.md must be updated together. The JSON is the source of truth; the MD is the human-readable view.
ops.title: Keep instincts.json and INSTINCTS.md in sync
ops.trigger: When updating instincts or compound memory

ops.action: Use `make` targets to run pipeline steps. Check the Makefile for available targets and their dependencies before running pipeline scripts directly.
ops.title: Makefile orchestrates data pipeline
ops.trigger: When running or modifying the data pipeline

ops.action: Check pipeline/04_generate_tiles.sh for tile generation logic. This is a standalone bash script, not part of the Python pipeline scripts.
ops.title: Tile generation uses dedicated shell script
ops.trigger: When working with the map tile generation step of the pipeline
